CTADescription: Hi, I'm Raúl, I like to create sharp-looking websites
aboutContent1: I started studying web development in 2019 on my own with the help of The Odin Project
aboutContent2: Learning how to work with Git through GitHub, then HTML and CSS, then in early 2020...
aboutContent3: I enrolled in Acámica’s Full Stack Web Development program in Buenos Aires, Argentina
aboutContent4: Where I improved my HTML and CSS skills and learned JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, and working with databases such as MySQL and MongoDB
aboutContent5: After I completed the Acámica program in September 2020, I added features and made improvements to some of the projects I’d started and started learning React.js on my own
aboutContent6: Currently I find myself looking for my first experience in the industry to work alongside a team and therefore be able to learn even more from them
projectContent1: The website you're currently seeing! Hope you like it, it's my first React.js AND TailwindCSS proper project
footerContent: Made with React.js, TawilwindCSS and a lot of ❤
